        public static void drawLine(@NotNull
                            PixelContainer canvas,
                            double from_x,
                            double from_y,
                            double to_x,
                            double to_y,
                            int color)
        Uses Xiaolin Wu's Anti-Aliased line drawing algorithm
        Parameters:
        canvas - the PixelContainer to draw this line on
        from_x - starting ordinate
        from_y - starting abscissa
        to_x - ending ordinate
        to_y - ending abscissa
        color - line pixel color
